description:
Luffy makes his long awaited entrance, Iceberg has a shocking surprise in store for Robin, and the true identities of the masked assassins of CP9 are finally revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: CP9 Takes Off Their Masks! Their Shocking True Faces!
CP9 срывают маски! Шокирующие настоящие лица
Kamen o Totta CP9! Sono Odoroki no Sugao
L`identità segreta del CP9 viene smascherata
Le CP9 fait tomber les masques ! Des identités stupéfiantes !
يخلع سي بي 9 أقنعتهم! وجوههم الحقيقيّة الصاعقة!
仮面を取ったCP9! その驚きの素顔
